At that time, the Lord of the Saha World, having heard the Buddha's words, immediately gave rise to understanding and spoke a verse:

Understanding that the characteristics of this dream are originally empty, the intrinsic nature of all dharmas is also like this.

It is also like beating a drum producing a loud sound, it has no thought or calling,
Thus discrimination is originally non-existent, one then understands all dharmas of the Great Sage.
